Ryan Atkinson

Frontend Web Developer

About Ryan Atkinson

20-something native of Virginia Beach, Virginia with a technical mind and a pragmatic approach to life. Jack-of-all-trades kind of guy who enjoys debugging more than you would expect. Comes alive when hunting for that missing parenthesis, as well as editing technical papers for clarity and readability. Web Development was the missing link in his life which finally connected his love of design, language, and meaningful problem-solving. Can be found painstakingly attempting to meditate in your local coffee shop.

Check out his resume for the bullet points!
